opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States

opinion:
536 U.S. 957

CLAY
v.
UNITED STATES.

No. 01-1500.

Supreme Court of the United States.

June 28, 2002.

1

C. A. 7th Cir. Certiorari granted limited to the following question: "Whether petitioner's judgment of conviction became `final' within the meaning of 28 U. S. C. § 2255, par. 6(1), one year after the Court of Appeals issued its mandate on direct appeal or one year after his time for filing a petition for writ of certiorari expired." Reported below: 30 Fed. Appx. 607.
